description.narrative: The most significant, expected project-level outcome is driven largely by its contributions to stakeholder impacts, notably the availability of cement at a reduced price. Beyond the Project, IFC expects the investment to promote market integration in Guinea by deepening domestic supply chains, as the supply of key construction materials for local infrastructure and housing will unlock a key bottleneck for the expansion of these sectors in the frontier areas of the country.
The project entails the construction of a greenfield integrated cement plant of 0.75 million tons per annum cement capacity.
